ExampleCommands:
[<color=#ffbd33>Example Commands</color>] 
[<color=#ffbd33>/npc count</color>] - Shows how many NPCs are on the map. 
[<color=#ffbd33>/npc kill</color>] - Kill all NPCs on the map. 
[<color=#ffbd33>/npc respawn</color>] - Respawn all NPCs on the map. 
[<color=#ffbd33>/npc reload</color>] - Reload plugin.
